name: Cooking Manger
description:
A creation for Three Thing Game, our three words being "Family, Last Minute, Manger". I am not sorry that it is terrible. I am quite proud of my baby (in it's Manger).

There isn't actually an ending so, it just keeps going. Sorry about that.

All fictional characters within the game do not represent real world individuals, and any love is sent out to anyone who connects with these characters. <3
